question.text: The following reaction descomposes <math> <mrow> <msub> <mtext>N</mtext> <mtext>2</mtext> </msub> <msub> <mtext>O</mtext> <mtext>5</mtext> </msub> <mo>→</mo><msub> <mrow> <mtext>2NO</mtext></mrow> <mtext>2</mtext> </msub> <mo>+</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <msub> <mtext>O</mtext> <mtext>2</mtext> </msub> <mo>.</mo></mrow> </math> At a <math> <mrow> <mn>25</mn></mrow> </math> degree centigrade the rate constant of the reaction is <math><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><msup><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">sec</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mi> </mi></mrow></mrow></math>. The initial pressure of <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub></math> is <math> <mrow> <mtext>0</mtext><mtext>.2</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext>atm</mtext><mtext>.</mtext></mrow> </math> If total pressure of gaseous mixture becomes <math> <mrow> <mtext>0</mtext><mtext>.35</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext>atm,</mtext></mrow> </math> then calculate the time of decomposition of <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub></math>.

options.text: <math><mn>238.6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>

<math><mn>138.6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>

<math><mn>69.3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>

<math><mn>89.3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>

solution.text:
(i) The decomposition reaction is represented by



Total pressure =p0-x+2x+x2=p0+32x=0.2 atm.
or 3x2=0.35-0.2=0.15
x=0.1 atm
Pressure of N2O5 after t seconds,
P=P0-x=0.2-0.1=0.1 atm
Now applying first order rate law
t= 2.303 k log 10 0.2 0.1
=2.3035×10-3log10⁡0.20.1=138.6 seconds
